manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LeakGuard skirt helps stop leaks. Anti-Slip Grip for easy insertion. FormFit expands to fit your shape. Tampax Tampons Our original period protection for your heavier days! For up to 8 hours of comfortable protection, try the tampon women continue to trust: Tampax Super Plus Cardboard Tampons. Featuring a unique LeakGuard skirt, Tampax Super Plus Cardboard Tampons offer backup protection to help stop leaks before they happen. Their FormFit design also gently expands to fit your unique shape, so you can feel comfortable and confident during your period. And Tampax Cardboard Tampons have an Anti-Slip Grip applicator for easy insertion. For tried-and-true feminine protection, try Tampax Super Plus Cardboard Tampons and next time, for comfortable, dependable protection, try Tampax Pearl tampons.

Stop leaks before they happen The powerful Tampax LeakGuard skirt helps stop leaks before they even happen, so you can get on with your day. Anti-Slip Grip The unique Tampax Anti-Slip Grip applicator helps provide easier insertion. Stay protected for up to 8 hours Don't let your period get in the way of your day! Tampax cardboard tampons provide up to 8 hours of comfortable protection. The tampon that fits your form Stay comfortable and confident your whole period long: FormFit gently expands to fit your unique shape.

Next Time Try Our Best Protection: Tampax Pearl* For comfortable, dependable protection during your period, next time try Tampax Pearl. Also available in Pocket Pearl and Pearl Active. *Also available as Tampax Radiant.

Tampax Cardboard Tampax Pearl Tampax Radiant Regular Tampax Pocket Pearl Tampax Pearl Active Our classic cardboard protection. Our best-selling tampon and America’s #1 choice*: the ultimate in comfortable, dependable protection, guaranteed. (*Based on sales data.) Our ultimate protection experience with a one-of-a-kind resealable wrapper for our most discreet disposal! Our most portable protection for on the go. Full-size protection in a compact plastic applicator. Our slimmest applicators that are super comfortable to insert and recommended for first-time users. Absorbencies Available Lite ✓ ✓ ✓ Regular ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Super ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Super Plus ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Ultra ✓

How does Tampax help stop leaks? Tampax cardboard tampons are designed to expand widthwise to fit your unique form and have a LeakGuard skirt to help stop leaks before they happen. If I like Tampax, what other products would be right for me? For the ultimate in comfortable, dependable protection during your period, next time try Tampax Pearl, Pocket Pearl, and Pearl Active tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are my absolute favorite tampons. They insert easily, are very absorbent and extract well. It is just disappointing that they are so difficult to find and pricey when I do find them. In an era where the concern for the environment is at an all time high, it is surprising that cardboard applicators have been replaced with plastic. These are so easy to insert and not a downgrade from plastic at all! Highly recommend and would love to see them at more places than Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No “Beach Whistles” here.
reviews.reviewText: I’m no environmental warrior, but I do recognize waste when I see it. Tampons with plastic applicators are so completely NOT environmentally friendly. Ever heard of “beach whistles”? Look it up... and then proceed to vomit. Anyway, these old school cardboard applicators work just fine. We have a septic system high in the Rocky Mountains, so barely anything gets flushed; these head into the garbage, and at least I know the cardboard will break down and not wash up on some beach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I can only find the plastic applicator Tampons in the stores and prefer the cardboard ones. They are thicker and absorb better than the plastic applicator types. Plus, I would think the cardboard decomposes better than the pastic. Don't like plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product. Seems more absorbent than other brands in Super Plus. I love that there’s no plastic waste. The packaging is paper and the applicator is cardboard so it’s biodegradable. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered on time. Did the trick.
reviews.reviewText: You don't really want to read a review of this product, do you? So let's just summarize as:I got this because I wanted an add-on item. It did not disappoint me - it successfully did what tampons are supposed to do. And there's a lot of them so I don't have to worry about running out for a while. Yay.Let me add a shout-out for cardboard applicators, which seem to be getting less and less popular. Cardboard is biodegradable, plastic is not. I don't really perceive a difference between plastic and cardboard "in action." This is not as pretty or colorful as the "Pearl" or "U" applicators, but does the stylishness of a *tampon applicator* really matter? Would it be too much think twice about choosing the non-biodegradable stylish plastic applicator over the biodegradable perfectly functional (and cheaper) cardboard applicator?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I know they have all this new fangled plastic stuff but I am old school. This cardboard is what I grew up with so I'm sticking to it. They are getting harder to find,so I appreciate Amazon for having them available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oldschool is best
reviews.reviewText: I don’t understand why these aren’t at my the local stores anymore but in my opinion they are far superior to the plastic applicator ones. They are slightly harder to insert at times but they don’t leak so it’s worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are ORANGE
reviews.reviewText: LOL I was rushing and purchased these because they looked like regulars, the yellow ones. These are orange. I had no use for them but I am sure they work well like all the others. Just too much for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable to use, absorbancy is great as per recommended guidance of leaflet.
Have these on auto ship! Price is right for 4 boxes!

This is my third time purchasing, as this was (Ley word “was”) an amazing deal to receive 4 boxes of 20 (that’s 80 total tampons). Until today when received my purchase today of only 1 box! Rip off. Will be returning - why would anyone spend $20 for 20 tampons???
The ad clearly says there are supposed to be 4 boxes but only one arrived. I did not receive an email asking me if I was happy with my purchase/service either.
